Wheeljack-X::

One by one, Jackie injects everyone with the vaccine.  When he gets 
to Nightlight and Elita, he takes care of the mother first, figuring 
that should put the child more at ease.  He loads up a smaller dose 
for Elita to keep from overloading her tiny systems.

OOC: You can all consider your chars safe; just post them getting to 
the lab (if necessary) and getting the shot.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight/Elita:
> 
> Nightlight move closed with Elita in arms, the baby was uneasy and 
> giggled "Calm down, little one"siad smiling Nightlight and lookign 
> to Aerotaur she replied "Yes the vaccine it's ready"
> 
> She tried to figure out how she could apply the vaccine in Aerotaur 
> and what to do with her baby..
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:

> >        He veritably skids into the room as Nightlight wishes 
> Rodimus

> you've got a

> gestures at
